resources.string: To send bitcoins, you must ask for a receive address. If offered a QR code, scan it using your phone\'s camera. If you receive a long string of letters numbers, you can copy and paste the address into the address field of the transaction screen of the app. Remember to double check the address once you have pasted it!

Once you have inputted the address, specify the amount of bitcoin to send (either in bitcoin units or in satoshis), and broadcast the transaction to the network. The transaction will then move on to the mempool, and will eventually be mined in a block!.
